br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie
Interface Restfulie

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRestfulie
public interface Restfulie

Controls the process of creating new relations and notifying the resource representation builder how these relations can be translated into links.

Since:
3.0.3
Author:
lucas cavalcanti, guilherme silveira
